languages.text: "Запретив Скорбящему Сонму забрать старшего хормейстера, Вольный Торговец подтвердил{mf||а} свою причастность к деятельности отъявленного еретика Кунрада Войгтвира. Хормейстер передавал для него сообщения, которые повлекли за собой бунты, акты ереси и прочие проявления непослушания. Адептус Арбитес были вынуждены казнить Омниса Праса самостоятельно".

"In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."
languages.original_text: "Запретив Скорбящему Сонму забрать старшего хормейстера, Вольный Торговец подтвердил{mf||а} свою причастность к деятельности отъявленного еретика Кунрада Войгтвира. Хормейстер передавал для него сообщения, которые повлекли за собой бунты, акты ереси и прочие проявления непослушания. Адептус Арбитес были вынуждены казнить Омниса Праса самостоятельно".

traits.locale_text: "In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Senior Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

languages.text: "Durch das Verbot an den Traurigen Gastgeber, den Chormeister zu ergreifen, hat {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} Komplizenschaft bei den Aktivitäten des berüchtigten Ketzers Kunrad Voigtvir bestätigt, dem der Chormeister Nachrichten übermittelt hat, die zu Meutereien, Akten der Ketzerei und anderen Formen des Ungehorsams geführt haben. Die Adeptus Arbites mussten eingreifen und Omnis Pras selbst hinrichten."
languages.original_text: "In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Durch das Verbot an den Traurigen Gastgeber, den Chormeister zu ergreifen, hat {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} Komplizenschaft bei den Aktivitäten des berüchtigten Ketzers Kunrad Voigtvir bestätigt, dem der Chormeister Nachrichten übermittelt hat, die zu Meutereien, Akten der Ketzerei und anderen Formen des Ungehorsams geführt haben. Die Adeptus Arbites mussten eingreifen und Omnis Pras selbst hinrichten."

languages.text: « En interdisant au Concile des Affligés de capturer le maître de chœur, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a confirmé son implication dans les activités de Kunrad Voigtvir, l'hérétique notoire. Le maître de chœur envoyait à ce dernier des messages ayant entraîné des mutineries, des actes d'hérésie et d'autres formes de désobéissance. L'Adeptus Arbites a dû intervenir et exécuter Omnis Pras en personne. »
languages.original_text: "In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

traits.locale_text: « En interdisant au Concile des Affligés de capturer le maître de chœur, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a confirmé son implication dans les activités de Kunrad Voigtvir, l'hérétique notoire. Le maître de chœur envoyait à ce dernier des messages ayant entraîné des mutineries, des actes d'hérésie et d'autres formes de désobéissance. L'Adeptus Arbites a dû intervenir et exécuter Omnis Pras en personne. »

languages.text: “行商浪人禁止阴沉之主逮捕达戈努斯的唱诗大师，这证明{mf|他|她}与恶名昭著的异端分子昆拉德·维特威尔存在同谋关系。唱诗大师一直在传递异端邪说，导致达戈努斯爆发了叛乱、异端恶行，以及其他颠覆帝国的活动。正因如此，帝国法务部不得不介入这场事端，亲手处决了奥姆尼斯·普拉斯。”
languages.original_text: "In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人禁止阴沉之主逮捕达戈努斯的唱诗大师，这证明{mf|他|她}与恶名昭著的异端分子昆拉德·维特威尔存在同谋关系。唱诗大师一直在传递异端邪说，导致达戈努斯爆发了叛乱、异端恶行，以及其他颠覆帝国的活动。正因如此，帝国法务部不得不介入这场事端，亲手处决了奥姆尼斯·普拉斯。”
“行商浪人禁止阴沉之主逮捕达戈努斯的唱诗大师，这证明{mf|他|她}与恶名昭著的异端分子昆拉德·维特威尔存在同谋关系。唱诗大师一直在传递异端邪说，导致达戈努斯爆发了叛乱、异端恶行，以及其他颠覆帝国的活动。正因如此，帝国法务部不得不介入这场事端，亲手处决了奥姆尼斯·普拉斯。”

languages.text: «Al prohibir la captura del maestro del Coro a la Hueste Dolosa, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente confirmó su complicidad con las acciones del infame hereje Kunrad Voigtvir, a quien el maestro del Coro había estado enviando mensajes que resultaron en motines, actos heréticos y otras formas de desobediencia. El Adeptus Arbites tuvo que intervenir y ejecutar a Omnis Pras por sus propios medios».
languages.original_text: "In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Al prohibir la captura del maestro del Coro a la Hueste Dolosa, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente confirmó su complicidad con las acciones del infame hereje Kunrad Voigtvir, a quien el maestro del Coro había estado enviando mensajes que resultaron en motines, actos heréticos y otras formas de desobediencia. El Adeptus Arbites tuvo que intervenir y ejecutar a Omnis Pras por sus propios medios».

languages.text: 「ドールフル・ホストがクワイアーマスターを捕らえるのを禁じたことで、ローグトレーダーは悪名高い異端者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルと共謀していることを自ら認めました。クワイアーマスターは彼に反乱、異端行為、その他の不服従につながるメッセージを伝えていました。高等裁定局が介入し、オムニス・プラスを処刑せざるを得ませんでした」
languages.original_text: "In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「ドールフル・ホストがクワイアーマスターを捕らえるのを禁じたことで、ローグトレーダーは悪名高い異端者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルと共謀していることを自ら認めました。クワイアーマスターは彼に反乱、異端行為、その他の不服従につながるメッセージを伝えていました。高等裁定局が介入し、オムニス・プラスを処刑せざるを得ませんでした」

languages.text: "Konakçı'nın Koro Şefi'ni ele geçirmesini yasaklayan Hür Tacir, bu şahsın meşum sapkın Kunrad Voigtvir'le iş birliği yaptığına dair şüpheleri doğrulamış oldu. Koro Şefi; Voigtvir'e, isyanlara, sapkın eylemlere ve itaati bozan faaliyetlere yol açan mesajlar iletiyordu. Nihayetinde Adeptus Arbites müdahale etmek zorunda kaldı ve Omnis Pras'ı bizzat infaz etti."
languages.original_text: "In forbidding the Doleful Host from capturing the Choirmaster, the Rogue Trader confirmed {mf|his|her} complicity in the activities of the infamous heretic Kunrad Voigtvir, to whom the Choirmaster had been relaying messages that had led to mutinies, acts of heresy, and other forms of disobedience. The Adeptus Arbites had to step in and execute Omnis Pras themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Konakçı'nın Koro Şefi'ni ele geçirmesini yasaklayan Hür Tacir, bu şahsın meşum sapkın Kunrad Voigtvir'le işbirliği yaptığına dair şüpheleri doğrulamış oldu. Koro Şefi, Voigtvir'e, isyanlara, sapkın eylemlere ve itaati bozan faaliyetlere yol açan mesajlar iletiyordu. Nihayetinde Adeptus Arbites müdahale etmek zorunda kaldı ve Omnis Pras'ı bizzat infaz etti."
